lead_paragraph: Germany's Thyssenkrupp has looked at the option of splitting its European steel business into a separate company that could be floated if a merger with Tata Steel assets fails, German weekly WirtschftsWoche reported on Friday.
snippet: Germany's Thyssenkrupp has looked at the option of splitting its European steel business into a separate company that could be floated if a merger with Tata Steel assets fails, German weekly WirtschftsWoche reported on Friday....

headline.print_headline: Questions for: ‘Before Vaquitas Vanish, a Desperate Bid to Save Them’
